name: Train Army
brief: Improve unit levels up to party level
description: Drill your troops in tactics and discipline to improve their combat effectiveness through various training methods

criticalSuccess.description: Your army trains to the current party level and gains the Heroism spell effect for their next combat.

success.description: Your army trains to the current party level.

criticalFailure.description: Your army trains to the current party level but gains the Frightened condition with a 10-minute duration for their next combat.
